message: Alex Jung says the web is mostly silent, and he's changing that with Berlin-based SoundCloud, which aims to be the YouTube of sound. Alex will be in studio with Jason on Tuesday -- What would you like Jason to ask him?
Qr codes as a music sharing tool
Which are the pros and cons of Berlin for startups?
Great one @BenBachhuber -- definitely a topic Jason and Alex will cover

Lutz: Definitely ask how it is like travailing so much as a CEO. Never followed someone who is of the plane so often. And this related to time with his team, organizing product but also private life. Whats that like? And does he like to change that? Does he miss a Concorde like of plane? Best!
Any issues with too strict privacy laws in germany?
Thanks @BenBachhuber @LutzVA. Your questions are in the doc!
Has anyone downdloaded the SoundCloud app yet? Curious to know what you think.
@kirinkalia I have... love soundcloud. Super easy to use and embed.
Any tips on which apps to use with soundcloud for maximum results?
Q: Is VideoCloud next? Or are there plans to incorporate video?
Not used soundcloud myself, but I have sent a couple of guys that make music their way :)
As an indie artist, I've found it to be very useful... Q: What's next for SoundCloud?
I think it's wrong to call a "learning disabled" person "retarded"... that's what needs to change first.
OO !  we just integrated soundcloud :D  stoked to watch this.
@TINYVOX Looks cool! Or should I say, "sounds" cool! :)
